statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, deploy_date FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE author = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum' ORDER BY deploy_date DESC;
SELECT id, author FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE contract_name LIKE '%token%';
SELECT contract_code FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE author = 'Bob' AND blockchain_platform = 'Hyperledger';
SELECT * FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE author = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_name, deploy_date FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum' ORDER BY deploy_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_contracts, blockchain_platform FROM smart_contract_templates GROUP BY blockchain_platform;
SELECT contract_name, author, deploy_date FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE deploy_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM smart_contract_templates WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Polkadot';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contract_executions ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_id, COUNT(execution_id) AS total_executions FROM contract_executions GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT contract_id, MAX(execution_timestamp) AS latest_execution FROM contract_executions GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM contract_executions WHERE execution_status = 'Success' ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT contract_id, count(execution_id) AS total_executions FROM contract_executions GROUP BY contract_id;

SELECT contract_id, contract_name, execution_status, execution_timestamp FROM smart_contracts INNER JOIN contract_executions ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_executions.contract_id WHERE contract_id = 3 ORDER BY execution_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, deploy_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT template_name FROM contract_templates WHERE template_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT contract_id, contract_code, deploy_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 3;
SELECT execution_date, execution_status, execution_result FROM contract_executions WHERE contract_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_name, deploy_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE deploy_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE '%template%';
SELECT template_name, template_description FROM contract_templates WHERE template_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contract_id, execution_date, execution_status FROM contract_executions WHERE execution_status = 'Successful';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM SmartContractTemplates;
SELECT * FROM ContractDeployments WHERE deployment_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, platform_version FROM BlockchainPlatform WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT executed_by, execution_date FROM ContractExecution ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM SmartContractTemplates WHERE contract_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SmartContractTemplates;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM SmartContractTemplates WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT deployment_id, deployment_date, deployed_by FROM ContractDeployments ORDER BY deployment_date DESC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM SmartContractTemplates WHERE contract_name LIKE '%token%';
SELECT platform_name, platform_version FROM BlockchainPlatform WHERE platform_id = (SELECT MAX(platform_id) FROM BlockchainPlatform);
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, created_at FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT contract_name, code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name = 'Example Contract';
SELECT party_name, address FROM contract_parties WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM contract_events WHERE event_type IN ('type1', 'type2') ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, created_at FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT party_name, address FROM contract_parties WHERE party_name LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT contract_name, event_name FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_events ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_events.contract_id;
SELECT cp.contract_id, cp.parameter_name, ce.event_name FROM contract_parameters cp JOIN contract_events ce ON cp.contract_id = ce.contract_id;
